Technique: FORMED BY HAND; PAINTED; ENGRAVED; FAYENCE
Name: Sekhmet
Description: This small amulet in blue green faience was part of a batch of 10 similar pieces from the collection of É. de Meester de Ravestein representing Sakhmet. The lion-headed goddess  is wearing a tripartite wig and  a long robe down to the ankles. The head is equipped with a small hole for suspension at the back.
